Counter-Strike - игра, которая задала новые стандарты жанра шутер и одна из тех первых игр, которая создала такое понятие как командная игра и которая дала жизнь кибер-спорту,. Нестареющая классика которая шла в ногу с подрастающем поколением, родившихся в конце до и после 90-х, благодаря которой мы стали те, какие мы есть, найдя в ней себя, друзей, интересы. Игра, к незабываемая своей простотой и не стареющей задумкой, до сих пор имеющая большое количество фанатов по всему миру. Вопросы есть?
fuck yea! the counterstrike superhero mod is fun

Well I guess since I have 117 hours clocked into this game *cough cough* steam bug *cough cough* I am obligated to write a review for this game. So this game is most definetly timeless as it is basically super smash bros melee to Counter-Strike:Source/Counter-Strike Global Offensive's super smash bros brawl. This game is unique as when you die you don't respawn until the next round meaning that your team can lose by having all of it's members die. As well, you need to buy your weapons or take them from the bodies of your enemies instead of just finding them scattered across the battlefield like other games of it's time did. Today the game can seem a bit outdated with a lack of ragdoll physics making aerial deaths look weird and unnatural as well as the obvious outdated graphics which can be "fixed" with a hd patch that just looks weird and unnatural compaired to games made at the time of the patch's creation (2003). Overall I would recommend this game if you buy the retail copy or if they fixed the bug that is the only reason why I have logged 117 hours into the game.

Very fun game, graphics are disappointing and just not nice, I personally live in Israel, Israel has a lot of multiplayer servers and their sons loads admit most enjoyable so it makes up for the graphics ... 
Also has the option to fight against bots you can practice with it or simply pass the time, I wish there was such a nice single player. 
So in short, if you are looking for a game with many Indians, multiplayer servers, easy and fun then this is the game for you!

Creio que Counter-Strike 1.6 seja um jogo que muitas pessoas conhecem,até quando você fala de "cs" bom para todos creio eu ja se tornou um ícone dos jogos,ainda lembro os meus tempos de lan-house onde eu ia só pra jogar cs (e mexer no orkut h3uh3h3u3hu3) agora você que esta em duvida se quer ou não comprar o jogo eu recomendo que comprem sim...Não se deichem enganar pelos gráficos o jogo em si é muito bom e não vai ser por gráficos que ele vai ser ruim,garanto a vocês que ele vai dar muitas horas de jogatina a vocês...Então aproveitem !! ;)

OBS:Tentem pegar ele em promoção ;)
